snippet: As Mayor Bill de Blasio and his surrogates continue to issue barbs at Michael R. Bloomberg, former Bloomberg administration officials have increasingly moved to defend him.
abstract: Entirely peaceful transfer of power from former New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg to Mayor Bill de Blasio has proved elusive, with de Blasio and his surrogates continuing to issue barbs about Bloomberg's tenure; many former Bloomberg administration officials have moved to defend him, saying it is their responsibility to correct record when de Blasio and his supporters misrepresent it.
lead_paragraph: As Mayor Bill de Blasio and his surrogates continue to issue barbs at Michael R. Bloomberg, former Bloomberg administration officials have increasingly moved to defend him.

headline.main: At de Blasio City Hall, Scorn (and Quiet Affirmation) for Bloomberg Years
headline.print_headline: Ex-Mayor Is Scorned (and Affirmed) at City Hall
